website_summaries.verdict: The Speedcross Vario 2 has delivered an impressive performance, according to many runners, with its technologies working together to yield multiple benefits to the user. However, despite the remarkable features, there were some who thought improvements are needed. Overall, the Speedcross Vario 2 has proven to be a reliable trail shoe.
pros: Many runners have observed that the outsole did a fantastic job, especially on muddy trails
A reviewer stated that the shoe provided excellent grip on all trail surfaces
The upper was very effective in guarding debris out as well as retaining foot dryness, according to a tester
Most users experienced a comfortable wear that did not require a break-in period
Several wearers said the Speedcross Vario 2 was a durable trail-running shoe
The shoe presented a snug fit resulting in a pleasant and smooth ride, one runner expressed
cons: A few consumers noticed the insole was not secure and kept moving out of place
The lugs on the outsole were not on the same level of efficiency as other Salomon trail running shoes, as mentioned by a reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these trainers for a tough mudder event to replace a previous pair of Salomon Speedcross. Required no breaking in and performed well for the event. Great grip, very comfortable and no blisters. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: trevm

customer_reviews.title: Tough light weight trek shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight trek shoe, very good grip. The shoe is narrow so if u have a wide foot may have to try it for comfort. Fit size is accurate and has half sizes if in doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Had to return them. Felt really unstable.
customer_reviews.text: My ankle felt incredibly unstable. Going to look for something that offers grip on a wider surface area on the front of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing trail shoes, light, tough, fab grip. Make sure to order whole size bigger than your usual size. Huge fan of Salomon shoes, but i always order a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! He's on his second pair as they are so comfy. Wears them to go walking and running.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthieb

customer_reviews.title: Snug with the greatest sole tread and grip
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, with the best grip I've experienced over wet surfaces. They are very snug, maybe choose a size larger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Trainers from Solomon
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of Solomon trainers, Im a size 9 and they fit well no issues. Prompt delivery as always be Amazon. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mr G.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small...
customer_reviews.text: Impossibly small! I’ve always been a 10 and just holding these they looked tiny. My partner’s an 8 1/2 and they fitted perfectly - so that’s a massive 1 1/2 sizes smaller then the label.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to go up a 1/2 size as toe box is tight but have found them comfy now for weeks on but the tongue has come away from inside on one shoe as the stitching has failed. Had to now complain to customer services. How poor is that !
customer_reviews.author: steven parkes-smith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes, I use this for fast hiking, much stronger grips than normal Speed cross.
customer_reviews.author: DOMINIC PULLEN

customer_reviews.title: Good for long distances!
customer_reviews.text: The size is very snug but didn’t have time to change. Otherwise a great trainer. Used them for Tough Mudder! Worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ananayo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy as incorrectly sized
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 8-9 and these size 9.5 are so small I can't wear them and have therefore wasted the cost of them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: They feel good quality though and were comfy apart from the toes
customer_reviews.text: Sent second pair back as much smaller than expected. I usually wear a 10 but went for 11 then 11.5. Very short with toe close to end. Got 12 on the way now. They feel good quality though and were comfy apart from the toes!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Maskill

customer_reviews.title: Size, does matter.
customer_reviews.text: Salomon, tend to be on the small size, I bought a 10.5, in place of a 9, which fits Nicely.
customer_reviews.author: derek whittle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered the wrong size. Reordered smaller and no issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, and as everyone else says go a half size up
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable out of the box, great grip and look good too
customer_reviews.author: Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: really tight fit even though I ordered up half a size
customer_reviews.author: Simon Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Check sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer. Only thing had to send back for next size up.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: An excellent shoe but too small by 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is exactly as expected from Salomon with the only issue being that you will need to buy half a size larger than normal to get a normal fit. I am a size 8 in every other shoe but these fit perfectly in an 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Check size first
customer_reviews.text: Quality trainer very good value for money second pair ive owned possibly get a larger size i am a nine had to get a size 10 this time 9 ok 10 bit better for movement
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: 1st trail runners I bought
customer_reviews.text: Will never bother with another shoe. Usually do a daily 10k that takes me across beaches, pine forest and some hard packed trails around where I live. These shoes are superb and with enough protection to wad off the occasional root or sharp stone. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: julia

product_meta.title: SALOMON Men's Speedcross Vario 2 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The SpeedCross Vario 2 shoe is the trail monster that's not afraid to go to the extremes. Based on the iconic Speedcross the Vario uses a slightly less aggressive tread with siping, and traditional laces for precise grip and comfort on soft or hard surfaces. Lightness: The lightweight shoe (270 to 310 g) ensures easy comfort even during long trainings. Water resistant: Protects your feet from rain and accumulated moisture. Traditional lacing system: The traditional lacing system allows you to manually tie and adjust your shoes to achieve the suitable fit. Fit management The Sensifit system cradles the foot perfectly, offering a secure and snug fit. Sole: The Wet Traction Contagrip sole is made from smooth and resistant rubber that offers exceptional traction and support for running on wet surfaces.
